title: Of the life or conuersation of a Christen man, a right godly treatise, wyrtten [sic] in the latin tonge, by maister Iohn Caluyne, a man of ryghte excellente learnynge and of no lesse godly conuersation. Translated into English by Thomas Broke Esquier Paymaister of Douer. An[no] M. D. XLix. The first day of Ianuary
author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Daye [and] Wyllyam Seres dwelling in Sepulchres parishe at the signe of the resurrection: and are to be solde at the litle conduit in Chepeside],
